item.title: 14 Best Tote Bags of 2025, Tested and Reviewed by WIRED
item.description: From beach days to board meetings, these top totes are designed to protect your valuables, and then some.

item.title: The TCL QM6K Trades Picture Punch for Refined Performance
item.description: TCL’s upgraded 6 Series skips the brightness blast for impressively balanced performance.

item.title: GHD’s Chronos Max Review: High Tech, Not High Heat
item.description: This new wide-plate straightening iron has only one temperature setting, but that’s not necessarily a bad thing.

item.title: How to Clean Everything On Your Bed (2025)
item.description: From comforters to sheets, pillows, and bed frames, here’s how to keep your bed in tip-top shape.

item.title: New Proofs Expand the Limits of What Cannot Be Known
item.description: By proving a broader version of Hilbert’s famous 10th problem, two groups of mathematicians have expanded the realm of mathematical unknowability.
